roleset.name: give punishment

example.name: all args
example.text: The National Association of Securities Dealers, the self-regulatory organization for the over-the-counter securities markets, disciplined a number of firms and individuals for alleged violations of industry rules.
example.arg: The National Association of Securities Dealers, the self-regulatory organization for the over-the-counter securities markets,
a number of firms and individuals
for alleged violations of industry rules

example.name: no agent
example.text: Paul Kleinaitis, an analyst at Duff & Phelps, says, ``Even though they have borrowing power, they-1 have been disciplined *trace*-1 about acquisitions.''
example.arg: Even though they have borrowing power

example.name: no cause
example.text: And [security authority Robert L. Duston]-1 favors *trace*-1 disciplining all employees who cheat.

roleset.note: Adjectival 'disciplined' doesn't mean punished but rather controlled,requiring different framing. A note for the future.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'discipline' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, although it really fits into 33. Framenet entry Rewards and Punishments. That's one class, not two.
